title: A Trip to Mars
creator_credit: Ashley Miller and Edison Manufacturing Company
brief_description: By mixing two power-like substances, a scientist discovers the source of reverse gravity. When he tries this concoction on himself, he is elevated to the planet Mars. This Edison Manufacturing Company production is reported to be the first science-fiction film produced in the United States.
